Text:
It should have been specified that each of the sections should be unzipped into the same folder. This will then contain all the .htm files while the actual comics are in subdirectories (by year.)
  Hope they are Enjoyed.
-Z.

What's easier is to rename the .zip extensions to .cbz and just scroll through, ignoring the htm files. it's a laziness thing I have.

BTW, these are excellently written and drawn!

Oh wow Waldobaby; That's a nice little program.
(All possible links here:)
en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CDisplay
  Though my pride is a little hurt, I have to admit that it's better than my html + Javascript coding... -except that my one shows the date.

-Oh curses! CDisplay can show  that too! (showing the file name.)
Thanks!  I'm putting together a collection of all my favorite comic strips, and 9CL is a guilty pleasure.

I know what you mean, jessieEB79.
I don't suppose that you've got coppies of Sundays for the last few months? I was on vacation and missed four or five of them!
